title: Request to Play Audio
custom_preconds:
As a baseball fan, I would like to ask at bat to play my favorite team's audio feed and have the app open up the requested feed.

GIVEN the user is in Ask At Bat
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a request for a game's audio feed

i.e.

- Open up the audio feed for the White Sox game.
- Play the Orioles game.
- Listen to...
- Gameday Audio...
- I want to hear...
- I want to listen...
- MLB tv / MLB.tv / MLBtv

Note: Do not test sentences staring with 'Hear..." since not mapped because the user may have meant "here ".

custom_steps_separated.content: IF the user is a lite user (not logged in)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: If the user is a paid user (logged in)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Gameday Audio EPG
AND user is able to play the a feed if available

title: Request to Play Video (MLB.tv)
custom_preconds:
As a baseball fan, I would like to ask at bat to play my favorite team's video feed and have the app open up the requested feed.

GIVEN the user is in Ask At Bat
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a request for a game's video feed

i.e.

- Open up the game feed for the White Sox game.
- I want to watch...
- I want to see..
- Gameday...
- Watch...
- See...
- MLB tv / MLB.tv / MLBtv
custom_expected: THEN the user is taken to the Gameday MLB.tv EPG

custom_steps_separated.content: IF user is a lite user (not logged in)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Gameday MLB.tv EPG
AND if user attempts to play a feed they are taken to the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: IF user is a paid user (logged in)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Gameday MLB.tv EPG
AND able to select a feed if available
